message: Let's start with a simple split - 60/40. It's a fair deal to get things moving!
Let's try a bit more in my favor, 55/45 is still a fair deal considering the inflation risk.
Time is ticking and that money's shrinking, Bob.  I'll come up slightly to 58/42 - let's be smart and take it.
Inflation's burning our cash, let's meet in the middle at 52.5/47.5, it's the fairest deal yet.
This is getting ridiculous, Bob.  I'll meet you exactly in the middle - 55/45.  Any more stalling and we'll both be eating ramen!
